mdRecord.dcterms:title: Skin of Our Teeth [by] Thornton Wilder; Boy Friend
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for the Barter Theatre. Programs: Skin of Our Teeth by Thornton Wilder, starring Herbert Nelson and Joan DeWeese. Aug 29-Sep 3 | The Boy Friend, Aug 21-27.

Virginia
